title: LFT Who wants a botlane!
body:
Any Teams need a new Botlane? 
We are an ADC/SUPPORT Duo who can play almost every ADC and Support Champion

Ranks: ADC - Silver, SUPPORT - Gold.
IGN: ADC - Hirukotane, SUPPORT - Skemmer,
Mains: ADC - Vayne & Corki, SUPPORT - Thresh & Janna

Add either of us for a chat if you are willing to have us on your team :)
